WaveSoundResource(filepath)
      Holds audio data from a .wav file. `.wav` files can be 8 or 16-bit PCM and only 22050Hz or 11025Hz sample rate
Parameters:
      filepath [value: string, type: string]
Attributes:
      data [value: value of bytearray containing the audio samples, type: bytearray]

file: src/resources/engine_wave_sound_resource.c
